title: Is Musk dating Meloni? Tesla CEO says 'we are ... '
content: Elon Musk dispelled rumors of dating Italian Prime Minister Georgia Meloni after their photo went viral on social media. He clarified the situation on X, stating they are not dating. Musk also praised Meloni during an awards ceremony in New York, commending her authenticity and honesty as a politician.
summary: Elon Musk dispelled rumors of dating Italian Prime Minister Georgia Meloni after their photo went viral on social media. He clarified the situation on X, stating they are not dating. Musk also praised Meloni during an awards ceremony in New York, commending her authenticity and honesty as a politician.

title: 'I did all this deviant, sexual stuff': Indian origin former NYC health adviser fired over sex party revelations
content: Dr Jay Varma, the former Covid-19 czar of New York City, has been dismissed from SIGA Technologies following revelations of his participation in drug-fuelled sex parties during the pandemic. Secret recordings disclosed his attendance at underground raves and hosting events while NYC was under lockdowns. He admitted to attending two private gatherings between April 2020 and May 2021.
summary: Dr Jay Varma, the former Covid-19 czar of New York City, has been dismissed from SIGA Technologies following revelations of his participation in drug-fuelled sex parties during the pandemic. Secret recordings disclosed his attendance at underground raves and hosting events while NYC was under lockdowns. He admitted to attending two private gatherings between April 2020 and May 2021.

title: 'Can see strings': Vivek Ramaswamy takes 'puppet' jibe as Alex Soros hosts Tim Walz at his place
content: Vivek Ramaswamy labeled Alex Soros a 'puppet' after he hosted Democrat Tim Walz. Elon Musk also criticized Soros for backing Kamala Harris. Both Alex and his father, George Soros, are strong supporters of Harris and the Democratic Party, contributing substantial amounts to their campaigns in recent elections.
summary: Vivek Ramaswamy labeled Alex Soros a 'puppet' after he hosted Democrat Tim Walz. Elon Musk also criticized Soros for backing Kamala Harris. Both Alex and his father, George Soros, are strong supporters of Harris and the Democratic Party, contributing substantial amounts to their campaigns in recent elections.

title: Tsunami alert in Australia turns out to be 'test warning' by authorities
content: Australians faced panic on Wednesday after receiving tsunami warnings via their weather app, which were later clarified as tests by the Bureau of Meteorology. The alert stemmed from an 8.2 magnitude earthquake off New Zealand's west coast. Authorities subsequently issued a "cancelled tsunami warning" and apologized for any confusion caused.
summary: Australians faced panic on Wednesday after receiving tsunami warnings via their weather app, which were later clarified as tests by the Bureau of Meteorology. The alert stemmed from an 8.2 magnitude earthquake off New Zealand's west coast. Authorities subsequently issued a "cancelled tsunami warning" and apologized for any confusion caused.

title: 'Hope America wipes Iran off face of Earth': Trump after US intel warns of Iran assassination threats
content: US intelligence warned Donald Trump of specific threats from Iran to assassinate him, prompting Trump to vow strong action against the nation. His campaign claims that Iran aims to destabilize the US elections through coordinated attacks and cyberattacks, which Iran denies. Both Trump's and Kamala Harris's campaigns reported foreign hacking attempts.
summary: US intelligence warned Donald Trump of specific threats from Iran to assassinate him, prompting Trump to vow strong action against the nation. His campaign claims that Iran aims to destabilize the US elections through coordinated attacks and cyberattacks, which Iran denies. Both Trump's and Kamala Harris's campaigns reported foreign hacking attempts.

title: 'Big threats on my life by Iran': Trump says surrounded by more guns than ever seen before
content: Donald Trump revealed that US intelligence has warned him of a serious assassination threat from Iran. He expressed gratitude to Congress for unanimously approving an increased budget for the Secret Service. Trump urged America to take decisive action against Iran if any such attempts occur, calling it a dire situation.
summary: Donald Trump revealed that US intelligence has warned him of a serious assassination threat from Iran. He expressed gratitude to Congress for unanimously approving an increased budget for the Secret Service. Trump urged America to take decisive action against Iran if any such attempts occur, calling it a dire situation.

title: Who is Laurene Powell Jobs? Invisible hand behind Kamala Harris's rise
content: Laurene Powell Jobs, worth $11 billion, is significantly influencing the 2024 US presidential elections. She has been a crucial supporter of Kamala Harris, donating millions and aiding Biden's exit from the race. Powell owns The Atlantic and holds shares in Monumental Sports & Entertainment.
summary: Laurene Powell Jobs, worth $11 billion, is significantly influencing the 2024 US presidential elections. She has been a crucial supporter of Kamala Harris, donating millions and aiding Biden's exit from the race. Powell owns The Atlantic and holds shares in Monumental Sports & Entertainment.

title: Who is Marcellus Williams? Missouri man executed despite victim's familyâ€™s calls to spare his life
content: Marcellus Williams, who consistently claimed innocence, was executed by lethal injection in Missouri despite objections from the local prosecutor and calls for clemency. Previous stays of execution did not overturn his conviction. A new DNA analysis led to the state Supreme Court rejecting arguments for his innocence, resulting in his execution.
summary: Marcellus Williams, who consistently claimed innocence, was executed by lethal injection in Missouri despite objections from the local prosecutor and calls for clemency. Previous stays of execution did not overturn his conviction. A new DNA analysis led to the state Supreme Court rejecting arguments for his innocence, resulting in his execution.

title: Kamala Harris let 21 million people enter US, many terrorists: Donald Trump
content: Donald Trump accused Kamala Harris of allowing over 21 million people, mostly 'terrorists,' to enter the U.S., causing tremendous damage. He claimed only he could fix this problem. Earlier, a Fox News report estimated around 7.3 million migrants had illegally crossed the southwest border during President Biden's tenure.
summary: Donald Trump accused Kamala Harris of allowing over 21 million people, mostly 'terrorists,' to enter the U.S., causing tremendous damage. He claimed only he could fix this problem. Earlier, a Fox News report estimated around 7.3 million migrants had illegally crossed the southwest border during President Biden's tenure.

He mocked President Biden's stance and Ukrainian President Zelenskyy. Meanwhile, at the UN, Zelenskyy called for global powers to force Russia into a peace settlement, rejecting any negotiations on Moscowâ€™s terms.

title: Shots fired at Kamala Harrisâ€™ Arizona campaign office for 2nd time in a month
content: Kamala Harris' Arizona campaign office faced its second attack within a month after shots were fired at a Democratic Party office in Phoenix. No injuries were reported. Authorities are investigating both incidents, which have raised concerns about safety and potential foreign interference in US elections, as warned by intelligence agencies.
summary: Kamala Harris' Arizona campaign office faced its second attack within a month after shots were fired at a Democratic Party office in Phoenix. No injuries were reported. Authorities are investigating both incidents, which have raised concerns about safety and potential foreign interference in US elections, as warned by intelligence agencies.

title: China test-fires intercontinental ballistic missile into Pacific Ocean
Kamala Harris has bigger cognitive problems than 'crooked' Joe: Donald Trump
content: Donald Trump, speaking at a Georgia rally, criticized vice president Kamala Harris and President Joe Biden. He alleged that Harris has more significant cognitive issues than Biden and claimed the world is laughing at her potential presidency. Trump also blamed their policies for increased inflation and global conflicts.
summary: Donald Trump, speaking at a Georgia rally, criticized vice president Kamala Harris and President Joe Biden. He alleged that Harris has more significant cognitive issues than Biden and claimed the world is laughing at her potential presidency. Trump also blamed their policies for increased inflation and global conflicts.

title: 'I wanted to die so many times': Hamas hostage recalls her days in captivity
content: Aviva Siegel was kidnapped during Hamas' attack on October 7 and released after weeks in captivity. Her husband Keith remains a hostage. Since her release last November as part of a truce, Aviva has been protesting for his freedom. The urgency increased after the Israeli military discovered six hostage bodies in Gaza.
summary: Aviva Siegel was kidnapped during Hamas' attack on October 7 and released after weeks in captivity. Her husband Keith remains a hostage. Since her release last November as part of a truce, Aviva has been protesting for his freedom. The urgency increased after the Israeli military discovered six hostage bodies in Gaza.

title: Thailand's historic same-sex marriage bill gets royal endorsement
content: Thailand's King has endorsed a historic marriage equality bill passed by parliament on June 18. Effective January 22, 2025, this law makes Thailand the first Southeast Asian country to legalise same-sex marriage. It grants equal rights to same-sex couples but does not address transgender and non-binary individuals' issues regarding identity documents.
summary: Thailand's King has endorsed a historic marriage equality bill passed by parliament on June 18. Effective January 22, 2025, this law makes Thailand the first Southeast Asian country to legalise same-sex marriage. It grants equal rights to same-sex couples but does not address transgender and non-binary individuals' issues regarding identity documents.

title: Zelenskyy rejects talks, calls for unspecified global 'action' to force Russia into peace
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy addressed the UN Security Council, dismissing peace talks with Russia and urging global action to end the invasion. He insisted that Russia must be compelled into peace. The session saw strong backing for Ukraine's sovereignty from UN officials, while US Secretary of State Antony Blinken accused China, Iran, and North Korea of aiding Russia.
summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy addressed the UN Security Council, dismissing peace talks with Russia and urging global action to end the invasion. He insisted that Russia must be compelled into peace. The session saw strong backing for Ukraine's sovereignty from UN officials, while US Secretary of State Antony Blinken accused China, Iran, and North Korea of aiding Russia.

title: Biden-Yunus meet in New York: US, Bangladesh affirm 'close partnership'
content: US President Joe Biden and Bangladesh's interim government chief Mohammed Yunus affirmed a close partnership, with Biden expressing support for Bangladesh's new reform agenda. They met at the UN General Assembly, where Yunus discussed student protests in Bangladesh. Upon arriving in New York, Yunus faced protests from demonstrators.
summary: US President Joe Biden and Bangladesh's interim government chief Mohammed Yunus affirmed a close partnership, with Biden expressing support for Bangladesh's new reform agenda. They met at the UN General Assembly, where Yunus discussed student protests in Bangladesh. Upon arriving in New York, Yunus faced protests from demonstrators.

title: Swiss police make arrests after suicide capsule is used for first time
content: Swiss police have arrested multiple individuals following the first use of the 'Sarco' suicide capsule in Schaffhausen. Created by Philip Nitschke, the device induces death via nitrogen gas. Authorities are investigating charges of inducing and aiding suicide. The deceased was a 64-year-old American woman suffering from severe health problems.
summary: Swiss police have arrested multiple individuals following the first use of the 'Sarco' suicide capsule in Schaffhausen. Created by Philip Nitschke, the device induces death via nitrogen gas. Authorities are investigating charges of inducing and aiding suicide. The deceased was a 64-year-old American woman suffering from severe health problems.

title: Top Hezbollah commander killed in Israeli strike on south Beirut
content: Ibrahim Mohammed Kobeissi, a top Hezbollah commander, was killed in an Israeli airstrike on South Beirut. The strike also resulted in six deaths and 15 injuries. Kobeissi was crucial to Hezbollah's missile operations. This incident is part of ongoing hostilities between Hezbollah and Israel since the Gaza war began last October.
summary: Ibrahim Mohammed Kobeissi, a top Hezbollah commander, was killed in an Israeli airstrike on South Beirut. The strike also resulted in six deaths and 15 injuries. Kobeissi was crucial to Hezbollah's missile operations. This incident is part of ongoing hostilities between Hezbollah and Israel since the Gaza war began last October.

title: Golf course gunman charged with attempting an assassination on Donald Trump
content: Ryan Wesley Routh has been charged by the United States for attempting to assassinate Donald Trump at his Florida golf course. Authorities allege he aimed a rifle at Trump while he was playing, and had written about his plans months before.
summary: Ryan Wesley Routh has been charged by the United States for attempting to assassinate Donald Trump at his Florida golf course. Authorities allege he aimed a rifle at Trump while he was playing, and had written about his plans months before.
